ing: 1 bulb fennel - trimmed, halved, and very thinly sliced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Bright and delicious summery salad. It is light, crunchy, and a perfect side to summer's outdoor meals. Best eaten at room temperature."
ins: Toss fennel, beets, and green onions together in a salad bowl. Drizzle lemon juice and olive oil over vegetables and sprinkle parsley and lemon zest on top. Season with salt and black pepper.
